definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This weight of evidence is something mystical and unanalyzable .
sentences.chinese: 證據的重要性是神祕不可解的。

sentences.english: However, many young people do not seem to realize the importance of modesty.
sentences.chinese: 然而，許多年輕人似乎沒有實現謙遜的重要性。

sentences.english: The thesis emphasizes the materiality of the compensation allocation first.
sentences.chinese: 論文首先強調了薪酬分配的重要性。

sentences.english: Several findings do indeed point to the importance of ESPs.
sentences.chinese: 一些研究結果的確證實了ESP的重要性。

sentences.english: The importance and vulnerability of seed banks have become apparent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 種子銀行的重要性和脆弱性近幾年來已很明顯。

sentences.english: It is important for engineering students to master specialty courses knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 對工科學生而百，專業課的重要性是不言而喻的。

sentences.english: The importance of Pauli principle manifests itself clearly.
sentences.chinese: 泡利原理的重要性清楚地表現了出來。

sentences.english: The team leader emphasized the importance of the rescue.
sentences.chinese: 隊長強調了這次營救任務的重要性。

sentences.english: The report noted the need for stronger US-China military ties.
sentences.chinese: 報告指出增強美中軍事聯繫的重要性。

sentences.english: From my experience, I'd like to talk about the importance and steps of review.
sentences.chinese: 我願意從我的經驗談複習的重要性和步驟方法。

sentences.english: Tody an increasing number of people have realized that law education is of great importance .In order to keep law and order, very one of us is supposed to get(=receive)a law education.
sentences.chinese: 現在越來越多的人認識到法制教育的重要性。

sentences.english: SamuelLing, The Meaning and ContemporarySignificance Confessing the Inerrancy of Scripture Today.
sentences.chinese: 林慈信，《認信聖經無誤的重要性和當今適切性》。

sentences.english: Recognize the importance of gie and take.
sentences.chinese: 認識到給予和獲得的重要性。

sentences.english: It never looses its importance in our life.
sentences.chinese: 它從來射向我們生活的重要性。

sentences.english: In this speech, Dean Ching-yun Chuang promotes the importance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 本講座我們邀請莊景雲主任來推廣快樂的重要性。

sentences.english: The importance of zinc powder full suspended in the purity process is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了在淨化過程中鋅粉全懸浮的重要性。

definition: to attach importance to sth/to value
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
from this, it can be seen that...
to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
